Topic.Title: gaming sales

Message.Msg: . The Good News! The new Nintendo Wii U gaming console is selling like hotcakes. Yes hotcakes, boys. The Bad News for nvidia: There are Zero (0) nvidia parts inside. None. Nana. Goose egg. "One of the Wii U's strengths is its custom AMD 7 series GPU." Which is based on AMD Radeon HD 5000 “Evergreen” series, don't u know. . Yet another huge, high volume opportunity -- Lost by nvidia. Read it and weep, boys. Google this: Game dev talks Wii CPU .

Topic.Title: gaming sales

Message.Msg: . So Best? How is Jen ever gonna make his overblown "guidance" if nvidia keeps losing the really Big, Elephantine-sized orders? Hummm? Just this month nvidia has lost, -- The Genuine Apple iPhone 5 -- The Amazon Kindle 2 -- The co-processer order for the Cray Cascade system for the Swiss National Supercomputing Centre (CSCS) in Lugano. -- And now, the GPU order for that selling-like-hotcakes Nintendo Wii U gaming console Looks like yet another Really Bad Quarter shaping-up here. -

Message.Title: Another Tegra 3 in China. Kungfu K3. Galaxy S3 type. Its china. Cloned phone is normal.
Message.Msg: Samsung is becoming the first Android smartphone manufacturer in the market today, thats why there is another manufacturer who built the same form factor. After Samsung released Galaxy S III on the market, there is another manufacturer who built smartphone look like Galaxy S III. After we’ve cover HDC Galaxy S III , It’s now another manufacturer who built the Galaxy S III knock-off thats called KungFu K3. The KungFu K3 is as powerful and stylish smartphone. POwered by quad-core NVIDIA Tegra 3 chipset running 1.4GHz clock-speed frequency, it run any task smoothly, in addition there is 8.0 megapixels rear camera and 1.3 megapixel front-facing camera for video call feature. This phone is packed with 4,7-inch QHD screen size display and support for HD playback video, running Android 4.1 Jelly Bean operating system and support for downloading multimedia content from Hulu Plus and thousand of application from Google Play Store. While we write this article, there is no information about the price, but this smartphone will be available on the Chinese market on the-end of October. Here are the quich specs of KungFu K3 Android smartphone : Size : 137.6 x 70.6 x 9.8 mm Weight : 145g with battery Display : 4.7-inch QHD screen with 1280 x 720 pixel (HD, 720p) CPU Speed : 1.4 GHz, quad-core NVIDIA Tegra 3 Operating System : Android™ 4.1 OS (Jelly Bean) Memory: Total storage : 16GB; RAM: 1GB Network : HSPA/WCDMA: Europe/Asia: 850/900/1900//2100 MHz , GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz Sensors : G-Sensor, Digital compass, Proximity sensor, Ambient light sensor Connectivity : 3.5 mm stereo audio jack Bluetooth with aptX™ enabled (Bluetooth® 4.0) Wi-Fi®: IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n DLNA® for wirelessly streaming media from the phone to a compatible TV or computer micro-USB 2.0 (5-pin) port with mobile high-definition video link (MHL) for USB or HDMI port Camera : 8 megapixel camera with auto focus, smart LED flash, support for 1080p HD video recording, 1.3 megapixel front camera (720p for video chat), Dedicated imaging chip Capture a photo in the midst of recording HD video High quality slow motion video capture and playback Multimedia: Audio supported formats: Playback: .aac, .amr, .ogg, .m4a, .mid, .mp3, .wav, .wma (Windows Media Audio 9) Recording: .amr Video supported formats: Playback: .3gp, .3g2, .mp4, .wmv (Windows Media Video 9), .avi (MP4 ASP and MP3), Recording: .mp4 Battery Capacity : 2500 mAh (Removable)

Topic.Title: Another Tegra 3 in China. Kungfu K3. Galaxy S3 type. Its china. Cloned phone is normal.

Message.Msg: . nvidia shareholders should be shocked -- Shocked I say -- to learn that their company has become The #1 Supplier of parts to the swarthy, illegal, deliberate patent infringing Chinese knock-off trade. First it was that Goophone I5 -- a swarthy, illegal, deliberate patent infringing Chinese knock-off of the Genuine Apple iPhone 5 -- powered by the nvidia tegra #3. And now this. The KungFu K3 -- a swarthy, illegal, deliberate patent infringing Chinese knock-off of the Genuine Samsung Galaxy S III phone -- powered by the nvidia tegra #3. "We don't care if the end use is illegal -- a sale is a sale and a buck is a buck", apparently say the morally bankrupt nvidia Sales Department. "Besides, it's the only way we can make Jen's otherwise unattainable revenue "guidance". Did I mention? The business practices of this company are Shocking. .

Topic.Title: Another Tegra 3 in China. Kungfu K3. Galaxy S3 type. Its china. Cloned phone is normal.

Message.Msg: mediatek is growing sales and making money while doing it. ss iis every other nvda competitors in the mobile space. nvda is growing alright, growing their Tegra loses by the Q. This is NOT a viable business plan. eg. Grey is obsolete way before it reaches the market ala all that R&D $s will get flushed down the toilet. Wayne, but the time it gets here, will be just a jelly bean part, zero chance of making back the hundreds of millions sunk in. getanid: you seriously think a 5+ or 6+ or 7+ yrs R&D project has a chance?? it means nvda started out with no breakthru thinking, just a me too project, and by the time 1st silicon out, competitors have already moved beyond that and they have to s can it and start all over again, with another me too project. This is Boulder. T his is Denver. Designing a leap frog cpu core is beyond their league, they don't have that core competence. nvda has NO viable business plan for Tegra. That whole program should be shut down or sold off. Continuing under Jen is just sinking in good $s after bad.

Message.Title: Head and Shoulders Pattern
Message.Msg: Can anyone confirm the H&S pattern forming on NVDA from the left shoulder on July 1, head on August 12, and right shoulder on September 13? NVDA has in recent years been a "perfect" Fibonacci conforming chart, and this time around it looks like it's headed to $12 through the current cycle.
